featured.text: Tim and Dom were too careless (B) nobody on the fishing ship saw them (C) the speed of the fishing ship was too fast (D) their rowboat was not strong enough 43.
The name of their rowboat was “Crackers.”

definition.zh_def: 一種小型的船，通常由人用槳划動。
definition.en_def: A small boat that is propelled by oars.
definition.example: We rented a rowboat to explore the lake.
